page.title: 04Events in Codford 1985
page.content: In 1985 there has been a church fete held at Manor Farm. Codford school held a fund raising week which included a jumble sale, mufti day and a sponsored spell and lots more. Â£750 was raised. There is going to be a Summer Spectacular at Codford Club on June 29th. This includes an all day football match,many stalls and also sideshows.In July there will be a play at the Woolstore Theatre.The play is called 'The Fantastical Adventures of the Owl and the Pussycat'.Many school children are taking part.We have had a school disco.There are quite a lot of clubs in Codford such as Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts and St Johns Ambulance.Every Thursday evening in Codford Club there is bingo for adults.Every Wednesday the Evergreen Club meet which is where old folk chat
